DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare local distant recurrence patient mid-rectal cancer treat wide mesorectal surgical excision straight colorectal anastomosis versus total mesorectal surgical excision colonic J pouch coloanal anastomosis . - Compare functional , physiological , anatomical outcome patient treat two surgical procedure . - Compare disease-free survival overall survival patient treat two surgical procedure . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord treatment center . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo surgical resection wide mesorectal excision follow straight colorectal anastomosis . - Arm II : Patients undergo surgical resection total mesorectal excision follow colonic J pouch coloanal anastomosis . Patients receive temporary ileostomy close 6 week later . Patients follow 6 week , every 4-6 month 2 year , every 6 month 2 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A minimum 800 patient ( 400 per arm ) accrue study .
